Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created 29.06.2001
11.12.2013 GB SCR18578 Replaced use of date() with GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE
13.11.2013 SH SCR18513 Added updated BTCP_BANKSWIFT = BADP_BANKSWIFT
10.07.2013 SH SCR18237 Added BTCP_IBAN and BTCP_BANKSWIFT
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
02.01.2012 GB SCR16990 Added update BTCH_WKA_ACCOUNT= BNKA_WKA_ACCOUNT
26.05.2011 SH SCR16483 Added update BTCH_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE
if BTCH_ADMNO = 0
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
28.12.2008 GB SCR14266 Removed the task write BANK_MONTH_DAY
20.12.2006 SH SCR11162 Added updates of BTCH_BATCHCODE and BTCH_DATE
in part "Create BATCH row" if fields were not updated before
01.05.2006 SH SCR11078 Added test on PI.BADP_ID > 0 to store new batches if
BTCH_LASTLINEBTCP = GNRL_NPAYSAUTOBATCH and additionally to call BPH250 if
PI.AUTOMATIC = Y
23.03.2006 SH SCR10673 Added BTCP_AMOUNTCURRC, BTCP_CURRENCYCLNT for
queue receipt
21.03.2006 SH SCR10673 Removed booking part for foreign cheques and added new
BTCP fields (BTCP_AMOUNTCURRC, BTCP_CURRENCYCLNT)
01.03.2006 SH SCR10519 No payment: Uses CLNT108_ACC_CURR to update
BTCP_CURRENCYACC and BTCP_CURRENCYPAY now
13.12.2005 SH SCR9746 Changed update BTCP_DEBC_DEBC = DEBC_DEBC (where
DEBC_NO = DRFT_DEBC), before blank was used for update
04.11.2005 SH SCR9421 Fixed bug with BTCP_CURRENCYACC for receipt cheques
25.10.2005 SH SCR9359 Part receipt cheques: Fixed bug update of BTCP_CURRENCYACC
has to be BANK_CURRENCY instead of CHQU_CURRENCY
12.09.2005 JJ SCR9065 changed BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT for drafts
30.06.2005 SH SCR8462 Added update BTCH_CODETYPEACCOUNT = BNKA_CODETYPE...
, only if PI.BADP_ID > 0, else BNKA could not be selected
30.06.2005 SH SCR8454 Extended update of BTCP_VALUEDATEPAYMENT for
payments/payments for foreign cheques with values from BNKA
22.06.2005 SH SCR8532 Added new part to store BTCP rows for non payments, f.i.
--> if BPH105 is called from one of the BCM430 modules
02.06.2005 SH SCR8418 Extended update of BTCH_OFFICE with BANK_HOFF_CODE;
Added uppdate BTCP_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO
if HUSR_HOFF_CODE = blank
13.04.2005 SH SCR8932 Fixed bug with update of PO.BADP_BTCH_ID for
normal payment handling
05.04.2005 SH SCR8932 Fixed bug with update of BTCP amount with cheque amount
and BTCP_LINENO
23.03.2005 SH SCR8009 Added new handling for drafts, therefore also some parts
of BPH105 had to be redesigned
10.03.2005 SH SCR7917 Changed updates of some BTCP amounts according to new CHQE
amount fields
18.12.2003 SH SCR5070 Changed update of BTCH_DATE if a new BTCH row has to be
- created. (see SCR for details)
05.09.2003 SH SCR4277 Changed BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR in
- BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR as argument PI.AMOUNT_IN for call
- BPH122
11.06.2003 JJ req JDO added recalc of BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH after calc of
BTCP_AMOUNTCURRACC if PI.BADP_ID > 0 and PI.CHQE_ID > 0
11.06.2003 SH SCR3721 Changed update of BTCP_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE
14.05.2003 SH SCR3517 Added new parameter PO.BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH and
- implemented new part for calculation the exchange difference costs charged by
- banks
20.02.2003 JJ SCR3037 additional init BTCH
14.10.2002 SH This is a 1:1 copy from org BPH105, which does not made updates
- physical updates to BADP. The updates have to be made by the calling programs
- Therefore some add. parameters ( 10-14) will be sent back
- The original BPH105 could be deleted in the future, if all calling *.BAK
- programs removed from ctl.
07.08.2002 SCR1841 Store 'N' to BTCP_STORNO_CALCHELLERCOSTS
30.07.2002 SH We obtain table DEBC in the current task now for updates to
- BADP_DEBC and BTCP_DEBC with DEBC_DEBC
07.05.2002 SH SCR1207 The call to BPH250, see R.S. only will be done, if
- PI.AUTOMATIC = 'Y' and BTCH_LASTLINEBTCP = GNRL_NPAYSAUTOBATCH
- (The maximum sum of payments for one batch was reached)
21.03.2002 SH Call BPH250 as serverjob use #GB701
19.02.2002 JJ SCR856 implemented new field BTCH_HYPB_BATCHNO
-- SCR#724 --> 31.01.2002 SH (Extended update to BADP-ADMNOINITIAL
and BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL with v.ADMNO/v.CLNTNO
-- only for normal payments
-- only if cheque receipt
-- only if cheque receipt
-- only if a draft receipt
-- Check if a new batch has to be stored
... only if no new batch has to be created, store new payment for already
existing batch
-- If PI.AUTOMATIC and BTCH_LASTLINEBTCP = GNRL_NPAYSAUTOBATCH, means
-- v.NewBatch = TRUE, the first bundle of payments have to be handled by BPH250,
-- therefore submit serverjob for BPH250
-- A new batch has to be created
-- Check if a new batch has to be created (only for payments)
-- only if no new batch has to be created
-- For normal payment and payment for foreign cheques
-- For cheques receipt
-- For drafts receipt
-- Final updates in case of previous blocks were not performed
-- Variable which have to be always updated
-- Normal payment
-- For cheques receipt
-- For drafts receipt
-- No payment (e.g. if called from BCM430 modules)
-- Final updates
... normal payment
... payment for cheque receipt
... draft receipt
... no payments
-- Final updates to BTCH
